recipes.title: Hinata Shoyo
recipes.desshot:
Shirt number: number 10
Position: Middle Blocker
recipes.description: Hinata is a first-year student at Karasuno High School. He was initially a wing spiker in junior high school and is currently a middle blocker. He inherits the number 10 from his idol, the former Karasuno ace known as the Tiny Giant. His play style makes him an excellent decoy, and though he wishes to become the team's ace, he grows to learn the importance of the decoy role and embraces it. Hinata is extremely cheerful, boisterous, and optimistic. In spite of his small size, clumsiness, and poor fundamentals, his extraordinary stamina, reflexes, and jumping ability earn him a spot as a regular. He is able to play exceptionally well when partnered with Kageyama as his setter.
ingredientLines: 4 baby chickens (poussins) or cornish hens (about 1 1/4 pounds each), or 4 chicken breast halves
1 tablespoon crushed red-pepper flakes, or to taste

recipes.title: Kageyama Tobio
recipes.description: Kageyama is a first-year student at Karasuno High School. He is the team's setter and was notoriously known as the "King of the Court" in junior high. While prodigiously talented, Kageyama's arrogant demeanor and inability to cooperate with teammates caused them to abandon him in the middle of a match, which deeply affected him and earned his nickname. He originally tried to enroll at Shiratorizawa but was not accepted. At Karasuno, he forms an unlikely duo with Hinata and begins to learn the importance of teamwork in volleyball. Kageyama is regarded by many to be a genius, with exceptional accuracy and instincts, and is one of the team's pillars.
ingredientLines: 2 or 3 links of chineses sausage, cut into 1/4 inch slices
Finely chopped green onion or cilantro

recipes.title: Sawamura Daichi
recipes.desshot:
Shirt number: number 1
Position: Captain, Wing Spiker
recipes.description: Sawamura is the captain of the volleyball club and a third-year student at Karasuno High School. He is a wing spiker, and very dependable at receiving. He helps stabilize the team with his kindness and resilience, but is also more than capable of intimidating his teammates into behaving when they get on his nerves. He usually prefers to let his fellow players work out their issues themselves rather than step in as the captain.
ingredientLines: 40 chicken wing pieces, or 20 whole chicken wings
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
1/3 to 1/2 cup chopped fresh cilantro leaves
1/4 cup light or regular sour cream
Juice 1/2 lemon (or why not try lime?)

recipes.title: Sugawara Kochi
recipes.desshot:
Shirt number: number 2
Position: Vice-Captain, Setter
recipes.description: Sugawara is the vice captain of the volleyball club and a third-year student at Karasuno High School. Originally the team's regular setter, his position is taken over by Kageyama. In spite of this, Sugawara remains supportive and determined to play as much as he can in his final year of high school. He is cheerful, soft-spoken, and empathetic - Coach Ukai notes that he has the full trust of his teammates. Sugawara is often able to devise new tactics and ideas, as well as sense if a fellow player is off their game.
ingredientLines: 1.0 tbsp vinegar (you can use cider, malt or wine)

recipes.title: Azumane Asahi
recipes.desshot:
Shirt number: number 3
Position: Wing Spiker
recipes.description: Azumane is a third-year student at Karasuno High School and a wing spiker in the volleyball club. He's considered the team's ace and powerhouse. His long hair, tall stature, and impressive strength often intimidate others at first, while some onlookers even suggest he is full-grown man who was held back. Despite this, he is timid and sometimes struggles with self-doubt, often referred to as having a "glass heart". Unlike the other third-years, he does not plan to go to university.
ingredientLines: 6 to 8 fresh long rice cake sticks, or 20 smaller rice cake sticks
3 to 4 tablespoons light soy sauce, depending on saltiness

recipes.title: Nishinoya yuu
recipes.description: Nishinoya is a second-year student at Karasuno High School and the team's libero. He is called "Karasuno's Guardian Deity" because of his skill, having won the "Best Libero" award while he was still in middle school. Like Hinata, he is short (the shortest player on the team, in fact) and energetic, but has greater maturity. Nishinoya is considered the backbone of the team, as his specialties are receives and block recovery. He has a close friendship with Asahi, refusing to play unless the latter returned to his role as the team's ace. Like Tanaka, he adores Shimizu, and mentions that one of the main reasons he enrolled at Karasuno in the first place was because he liked the girls' uniforms.
ingredientLines: 1 box (about 18 oz.) yellow or white cake mix

recipes.title: Tanaka Ryunosuke
recipes.desshot:
Shirt number: number 5
Position: Wing Spiker
recipes.description: Tanaka is a second-year student at Karasuno High School and a wing spiker. He is loud, fierce and aggressive, but respects his seniors and looks out for his juniors. While on the court, he displays amazing mental strength, even when he is continuously targeted by the opposite team. Unfortunately, his behavior and appearance sometimes make a poor impression. Tanaka often picks fights which the third-years must then break up. He and Nishinoya adore their manager Shimizu.
ingredientLines: 2 1/2 cups self-rising white lily or cake flour

recipes.title: Tsukishima Kei
recipes.desshot:
Shirt number: number 11
Position: Middle Blocker
recipes.description: Tsukishima is a first-year student at Karasuno High School and a middle blocker. He is initially antagonistic towards Hinata and Kageyama, mocking their various shortcomings. Despite his flippant and sometimes outright negative attitude, Tsukishima is a very analytical and smart blocker, as well as Karasuno's tallest player. Tsukishima is the only team member to question his own devotion to the sport, due in part to past personal experiences. His closest friend on the team is Yamaguchi, who refers to him by the nickname "Tsukki".
ingredientLines: 1 tbsp butter for creamed chanterelle mushroom sauce
Salt and freshly ground black pepp

recipes.title: Yamaguchi Tadashi
recipes.desshot:
Shirt number: number 12
Position: Middle Blocker
recipes.description: Yamaguchi is a first-year student at Karasuno High School and a middle blocker. He has followed Tsukishima around since the third grade, when the latter warded off a group of bullies. He is shy but friendly, and tries his best to contribute to the team. With the help of Makoto Shimada, he practices the "jump float serve" to better support the team as a pinch server.
ingredientLines: 1 cup cream or half and half

recipes.title: Ukai Keishin
recipes.description: An alumnus and the coach of the Karasuno High School volleyball team. He is the grandson of previous coach and also a member of Karasuno Neighborhood Association. He helps out his mother at her shop. Although he initially refused to be Karasuno's technical coach, he agrees to first stay as coach until their practice match against Nekoma, later changing his mind to continue.

recipes.title: Takeda Ittetsu
recipes.description: A teacher at Karasuno High School and the faculty advisor of the volleyball team. While he doesn't know much about the sport, he always takes notes about everything he learns and supports the team to the fullest. He has an enthusiastic and brave personality, which impresses the Nekoma coach, getting him to agree to hold practice matches with the Karasuno team. He often talks in metaphors which are sometimes hard to understand by the team.

recipes.title: Shimizu Kiyoko
recipes.description: Shimizu is a third-year student and the manager of the Karasuno High School volleyball club. She was a former member of the track club before becoming the team's manager. She has a strict and straightforward personality, but is surprisingly shy when she attempts to provide words of encouragement to the team. After recruiting Yachi, she begins training her to take over as manager, opening up and proving herself to be an excellent mentor. Due to her attractiveness, she is often ogled by opponents and onlookers, as well as Nishinoya and Tanaka, who jealously guard her.

recipes.title: Yachi hitoka
recipes.description: A first year student who is recruited by Shimizu to be an assistant manager for the volleyball club. She appears to be nervous, but makes friends with Hinata, and then opens up to everyone else in the team. She learns about volleyball quickly and often takes notes. She also helps Hinata and Kageyama with their studies. Her kind personality makes her take notice and worry about anyone having troubles in the team. She also designs posters to ask for donations for the team, being helped and influenced by her mother, who is a designer.
